The license file has been successfully installed and application activated. Thank you very much for choosing Device Monitoring Studio!

There was an error installing selected license file. This may be due to the following:

 · Corrupt license file.
 · Expired license file.
 · License file for another product.

Log into the My Account section of our web site and download new license file for free.

Message.description: Notification to restart to apply license
Message.value: It is strongly recommended that you restart the product to reflect changes.
Welcome to HHD Software Free Device Monitoring Studio

Some extended features of Device Monitoring Studio are [[[bTrial]]] or [[[bExpired]]].

You may continue with limited functionality or upgrade to the extended version.

Message.description: Trial dialog: text in trial edition
Message.value: The following components are [[[bTrial]]] or [[[bExpired]]].\n\nYou cannot continue using expired components and have a limited trial period for trial components. To eliminate this screen, you will need to purchase at least one component.

You'll now be redirected to the My Account section of HHD Software web site where you'll be able to configure your upgrade.

Please note that if you are using registered version, then you already have an account.

Use Password Hint if you cannot remember your password or ask our support team if you are still unable to login.
